$ul: **appointment**: Appointment ID corresponding to the initial prescription
**daw**: If true, the prescription should be dispensed as written and not substituted
**dosage_quantity**: Please note, this used to be an decimal field, you can still pass decimal value to it. Or you can pass in some formatted string if needed.
**notes**: Any additional notes from the provider

**order_status**: One of `""`, `"Ordered"`, `"Administered during visit"`, `"Electronic eRx Sent"`, `"Phoned into Pharmacy"`, `"Faxed to Pharmacy"`, `"Paper Rx"`, `"Prescription Printed"`, `"Discontinued"`, `"Prescribed by other Dr"` or `"Over the Counter"`. If omitted in writing, default to `""`
**prn**: If `True`, the medication should be taken when necessary
**status**: If present, one of `"active"` or `"inactive"`. If omitted in writing, default to `"active"`
